data.text: @ITGuy1959 The solution is skin in the game.  Easy to say, not so easy to implement.
@ITGuy1959 “Failing up” is a phrase I’ve heard a lot lately and seems to perfectly encapsulate the issue
@jdnrvz Yup, I would even contend they somehow fail up. I.e. the more wrong they are, the more their career blossoms.

@ITGuy1959 These people are consistently wrong and yet somehow they maintain their positions and paycheck. If im wrong by a factor of 10 in my job i lose it, and somehow these people can be wrong my multiple orders of magnitude and get promoted 🤦🏽‍♂️
@ITGuy1959 I wonder how much $$$ he got paid for his prior work?
